creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: one large fruit, cut open near LL corner to expose star-shaped seeds(?); 4 other smaller fruits with pointed protrusions
markings: 4-character untranslated inscription, in black, at UL corner; 2 seals, in red, at L edge; one seal, in red, at LR corner; \'2\', in pencil, on back of mount at UL corner
title: Lotus Root, from an album of vegetables
